---
id: verify-email
title: "VerifyEmail"
description: "VerifyEmail verifies a user's email address by validating the token in the request and setting the user's validated field in the database to true. This endpoint is intended to be called by frontend applications after the user has followed the link in the verification email"
sidebar_label: "VerifyEmail"
hide_title: true
hide_table_of_contents: true
api: 
sidebar_class_name: "get api-method"
info_path: docs/api/rest-api/openlane-openapi-3-1-1-specifications
custom_edit_url: null
---

import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"VerifyEmail"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/verify"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>

</MethodEndpoint>



VerifyEmail verifies a user's email address by validating the token in the request and setting the user's validated field in the database to true. This endpoint is intended to be called by frontend applications after the user has followed the link in the verification email

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"in":"query","name":"token","schema":{"properties":{"Token":{"description":"The token to be used to verify the email address, token is sent via email","type":"string"}},"type":"object","title":"VerifyRequest"}}]}
>

</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>

</RequestSchema>
